sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-05-18 20:00:47.351794 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-07-14T02:43:29.592648-04:00.

rdgGrp.n: ['<del>he is, moreover, heroically generous.</del>', 'i will relate to you an anecdote of his life, recounted to me by the parties themselves, which exemplifies the generosity, i had almost said the heroism of his nature.']
